text: This is an alphabetical list of rivers of Canada. ==A== * Assiniboine River ==B== *Bow River ==C== * Chaudi√®re River * Columbia River ==D== * Detroit River ==F== * Fraser River ==K== * Klondike River ==L== * L'Assomption River * Saint Lawrence River ==M== * Mackenzie River ==O== * Ottawa River ==P== * Peace River (Canada) ==R== * Red River of the North ==S== * Saskatchewan River * Slave River * Smitley River * South Nahanni River ==Y== * Yukon River * Canada rivers
title: List of rivers of Canada
